replies.bodyText:
I refrained from adding a new table type because of the following two reasons:

Since ingestion mode is still offline, it seems appropriate that table type still remain OFFLINE
Adding a new type would be an invasive change and I wasn't sure of the blast radius.

Instead of adding a new TableDataManagerType I have now added a boolean similar to how we are identifying the dim table in table config. Even for a future realtime dim table, this approach should work. Does this approach look good?
replies.author: dharakk

replies.bodyText: Some suggestions: We could use TableSubtype maybe. And make it an enum so that we have some room in the future. I am not sure if, for example, a different layout of a larger table can also support joins.
